metadata.title: CVE-2021-35584 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Cluster product of Oracle MySQL (component:Cluster: ndbcluster/plugin DDL). Supported versions that are affected are8.0.26 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privilegedattacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQLCluster. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) ofMySQL Cluster. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

criterions.comment: mysql-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mysql-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mariadb-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
